card.text: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.text: The owner of target artifact or enchantment shuffles it into their library.

card.name: Prodigy Adventurer
card.text: Whenever Prodigy Adventurer attacks while you control another Warrior, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. The same is true for a Cleric and lifelink, a Rogue and first strike, and a Wizard and flying.

card.name: Ondu Griffin
card.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Hopeful Recruit
card.text: {W}: Put a level counter on Hopeful Recruit. Hopeful Recruit gets +1/+0 and has first strike as long as it has a level counter on it. Hopeful Recruit also gets +3/+3 and has lifelink as long as it has four or more level counters on it. Hopeful Recruit also gets +4/+4 and has indestructible as long as it has eight or more level counters on it.

card.text: Cooperation (Whenever you attack, you may tap this creature. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the following abilities until end of turn.) Flying, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, untap this creature.

card.name: Supression Gem
card.text: Flash Permanents entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: Hunger Breaches Akoum
card.text: Exile your graveyard. If three or more cards were exiled this way, draw two cards. If seven or more cards were exiled this way, instead draw four cards. If fourteen or more cards were exiled this way, also take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Hedron Sealing
card.text: Flash Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent is a 3/3 creature and loses all other card types and abilities.

card.name: Everlearning Student

Whenever Everlearning Student attacks, if it has four or more level counters on it, create a tapped and attacking 2/1 blue Illusion creature token.

card.name: Coralhelm Silencer

card.text: Cooperation (Whenever you attack, you may tap this creature. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the following ability until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or dies, draw a card.

card.text: Atavistic {5}{C}{U} (You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{U}.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a Scion token. (It's a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.")

card.name: Rune-Scarred Demon
card.text: Flying When Rune-Scarred Demon enters, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Death's Shadow
card.text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

card.name: Zhulia Sycophant
card.text: {1}{C}: Put a level counter on Zhulia Sycophant. As long as Zhulia Sycophant has two or more level counters on it, it gets +2/+1. When you put the fifth level counter on Zhulia Sycophant, remove all counters from it and turn it face down. It becomes a 7/7 Eldrazi with "Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents."

card.name: Hellcarver Consoler
card.text: Hellcarver Consoler gets +2/+2 and has flying as long as you control a Demon. Whenever Hellcarver Consoler deals combat damage to a player, put a level counter on it. Then if it has three or more level counters on it, you may search your library for a Demon card, reveal it, put that card in your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Ruthless Expedition Leader
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Ruthless Expedition Leader. Cooperation (Whenever you attack, you may tap this creature. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the following ability until end of turn.) Sacrifice a creature: This creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Stoic Deceiver
card.text: Atavistic {5}{C}{B} (You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{B}.) Lifelink When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You may exile a nonland card from their hand or graveyard and pay life equal to its mana value. If you do, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Preternatural Spawner
card.text: Atavistic {5}{C}{R} (You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{R}.) Whenever Preternatural Spawner attacks, create X Scion tokens, where X is half its power, rounded down. (A Scion is a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.")

card.name: Lavastep Excavator
card.text: You may play land cards from your graveyard. If you play a land this way, it enters with a finality counter on it and has "When you activate one of this land's abilities, sacrifice it." (Do this only if you have an available land play remaining.)

card.name: Tyrant of Akoum
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever a creature you control that entered this turn attacks, put a level counter on Tyrant of Akoum. Whenever Tyrant of Akoum attacks, if it has three or more level counters on it, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Vicious Magmutt
card.text: Haste Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, each opponent sacrifices a permanent at random.

card.name: Shatterskull Guide
card.text: Cooperation (Whenever you attack, you may tap this creature. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the following ability until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or battle, you may sacrifice it. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Cataclysmic Force
card.text: Cataclysmic Force deals X damage to each creature, planeswalker, and battle, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Bala Ged Greenwarden
card.text: Reach If a basic land entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Joraga Chieftain
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, put a level counter on Joraga Chieftain. As long as Joraga Chieftain has two or more level counters on it, Joraga Chieftain and other Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}." As long as Joraga Chieftain has four or more level counters on it, Joraga Chieftain and other Elves you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Mare of Blooming Tresses
card.text: You may play cards from your hand face down. They're lands with "{T}: Add {C}." (Do this only if you have an available land play remaining.) {3}{G}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pulsating Heart
card.text: Atavistic {5}{C}{G} (You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{G}.) At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Scion token. (It's a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.")

card.name: Huntsman of Graypelt
card.text: Cooperation (Whenever you attack, you may tap this creature. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the following abilities until end of turn.) Trample This creature gets +X/+X as long as it has attacked this turn, where X is equal to its power.

card.name: Unyielding Conviction
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a critical counter on it. If it already had a critical counter on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead. (If it would deal damage, remove a critical counter and it deals twice that much instead.) At the beginning of your end step, if sources you control dealt 7 or more damage this turn, create a token that's a copy of Unyielding Conviction.

card.name: Iona, Emeria's Blessing
card.text: Flying, lifelink Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, note a color. Iona, Emeria's Blessing has protection from each color noted by her.

card.name: Jwar Isle Riddler
Hellcarver Tyrant
card.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying and you lose 5 life.

card.name: Valakut Hellhound
card.text: Valakut Hellhound can't be blocked except by exactly three creatures. Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, exile the top card of your library, a nonland card at random from your graveyard, and a card at random from your hand. If you exile three cards this way, cast a spell from among them at random without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Vigorous Asp
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, untap it. (You may tap that land in response to get mana if it is untapped.)

card.name: Blinded Overseer
card.text: Flying When Blinded Overseer enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Ghostly Steed
card.text: Whenever Ghostly Steed attacks, another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. When Ghostly Steed dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Skittering Gigapede
card.text: Menace Whenever you defeat a battle, you may return Skittering Gigapede from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Heart of Khalni
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, Heart of Khalni deals 2 damage to that player. At the beginning of your end step, if sources you control dealt 7 or more damage this turn, return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Valakut Expedition Guard
card.text: If one or more counters would be put on a creature you control, those counters plus your choice of a reach, trample, or vigilance counter are put on it instead.

card.name: Tishusehl's Chosen
card.text: Whenever Tishusehl's Chosen or another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. When Tishusehl's Chosen dies, you may pay X life, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn. If you do, create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying.

card.name: Purifying Flame
card.text: Draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a nonland card this way, Purifying Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Bloodchief's Gift
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Expedition Windcaller
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Bounty of Reality
card.text: Atavistic {5}{C}{G}{U} (You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{G}{U}.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw a card. You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

card.name: Hedron Vanquisher
card.text: Flying Exile three cards from your graveyard: Return another target creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Tanali, Blade of Hunger
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more defense counters are removed from a battle an opponent protects, that player loses that much life. Whenever you defeat a battle, put two +1/+1 counters on Tanali, Blade of Hunger.

card.name: Kalitas, Tyrant of Ghet
card.text: Menace Whenever Kalitas, Tyrant of Ghet attacks a player, for each battle that player protects, create a 2/2 black Zombie token with "This creature can't block" that's tapped and attacking that battle. Whenever a Zombie you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Obuun, Mul Daya Speaker
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. You may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, if sources you control dealt 7 or more damage this turn, double the number of each kind of counter on lands you control.

card.name: Enduring Camaraderie

card.name: Ambitious Pyromancer
card.text: When Ambitious Pyromancer enters, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Rayami, Zhulia's Devoted
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with "This creature can't block." Whenever a creature token you control enters, put your choice of a vigilance, menace, deathtouch, reach, or trample counter on it.

card.name: Stoneforge Apprentice
card.text: When Stoneforge Apprentice enters, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. card.name: Yarok, Abounding Stream
card.text: Yarok, Abounding Stream's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.text: When Hedron Amalgam enters, scry 2.

card.name: Lightning Tornado
card.text: Lightning Tornado deals twice X damage to target creature or battle. When excess damage is dealt this way, put a critical counter on target creature you control. (If it would deal damage, remove a critical counter and it deals twice that much instead.)

card.name: Overwhelming Ferocity
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. When the creature you don't control dies this turn, put a critical counter on the creature you control. (If it would deal damage, remove a critical counter and it deals twice that much instead.)

card.name: Nahiri's Resolve
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and have haste. At the beginning of your end step, exile any number of nontoken artifacts and/or creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep.

card.name: Okar of the Akoum House
card.text: Creatures you control with flying have cooperation with that ability. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the cooperation ability until end of turn.)

card.name: Beacon Across Eternities
card.text: You may search your library for a white planeswalker card with mana value less than or equal to the amount of mana spent to cast this spell and exile it. You may activate one of its loyalty abilities as though it had three loyalty counters on it.
